name: Buy Your Freedom
description:
This is our hero: @

You have met him before. He was a rogue once, and has traversed the forgotten passages of NetHack and delved the endless depths of Angband. Now @ is back and he is in trouble!

For miscellaneous crimes, @ has been sentenced to fight in an unending arena. Armed with only his trusty sword, a bow, and whatever bombs he can find, @ must fight an unending battle. However, if he is fortunate, he might be able to find enough loot to buy his freedom!
